subject: From Cross Keys Bank USA.
body:
From Cross Keys Bank USA.
Contact Person: Mr Anthony Bowman
Accountant Officer (Cross Keys Bank)
Cross Keys Bank 307 Plank Rd. Saint Joseph, Louisiana 71366 United
States of America
Blessed Day,
I believe this will be a good news to you, We done a board of
directors meeting today in this Bank hall and our Director general has
signed the release of your $8 Millions to you this week as it was
approved.
What it will cost you now to get your funds release to you is $25.00
Steam Wallet card Razer Gold card and If you send this Steam Wallet
card Razer Gold card or of $25.00 this morning, you will get your
funds
This is last opportunity you have to claim your winning funds and what
it will cost you now are just Steam Wallet card or Razer Gold card of
$25.00.
Have a great day.
Yours sincerely,
Mr Anthony Bowman
+15106190125
Chair Of the Cross Keys Bank USA.
Co-chief Operating Officer,
Cross Keys BankÂ®
Corporate Office, NY
Federal Cross Keys Bank USA, N.A. Member FDIC

subject: Re: From Cross Keys Bank USA.
body:
Hello Mr. Anthony Bowman,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you're having a good day as well. I must say, your email has caught my attention. Could you please provide me with more details about the release of my funds? I'm curious to know how this process works and why Steam Wallet cards or Razer Gold cards are required.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary
